computer_extension_attribute.name: Jamf Protect - Last Insights Check-in
computer_extension_attribute.description: Displays the date and time of the last Insights check-in for Jamf Protect

input_type.script:
#!/bin/sh
#Jamf Protect Location jamfProtectBinaryLocation="/usr/local/bin/protectctl"
if [ -f "$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" ]; then jamfProtectInfoInsightsSync=$("$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" info | sed -n '5 p' | awk -F 'Last Insights:' '{print $2}' | xargs) else jamfProtectInfoInsightsSync="Does not exist" fi
echo "jamfProtectInfoInsightsSync" echo "<result>$jamfProtectInfoInsightsSync</result>"
